title: Blockbuster Moves in the PL
description:
Chelsea spend 70 million on Wesley Fofana and Newcastle spend 60 million on Isak. Will Premier league clubs come to regret these big purchases? The guys also preview the biggest matches of the weekend in England, Spain, and Germany.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Chelsea splash big on another defender; Newcastle take a massive punt on Isak; preview of this weekend's biggest games
